TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit MessageTooLargeException extends Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.Exceptions.IotHubException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to send a message fails because the length of the message exceeds the maximum size allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 maximumMessageSizeInBytes) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string containing the maximum sized allowed for a message, in bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A description of the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string set to the message parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: A description of the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string set to the message parameter and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
